main: Standard Heishou mechanic: Using S3 or defense gives a 3 turn buff corresponding to their Heishou Pack. {status:GrownHorns} gives her more {status:Burst} and {status:Sinking} application and converts some of her coins to {status:SuperCoin}s (last coin of S2, all coins of S3). Her passive increases the damage of the last coin on her skills if she has the buff and increases it further if it's against a defense skill.
Standard Heishou mechanic: Combos with {identity:10613}'s S3. The buff lets him inflict 1 {status:Sinking} whenever he inflicts {status:Burst}.

S3 inflicts {status:CrushMarks} for 3 turns. It's a panic changing debuff that increases the target's {keyword:Gluttony} and {keyword:Gloom} damage taken. Enemies with SP lose Clash Power and inflict {status:DefenseDown} on low SP or panic. Enemies without SP lose 1 Clash Power.
other: S1 and S3 deal increased damage if the target has {status:CrushMarks}
Her passive increases damage against enemies at less than 0 SP and enemies with {status:Burst} and {status:Sinking}.

1031301.desc:
Deal +1% damage for every 2 ([Burst] + [Sinking]) on target (max 15%)
- Double this effect and max value against targets without SP

If this unit has [GrownHorns], the last coin of this unit's Base Skills deals +10% damage
- When attacking Skill Slot equipped with a Defense Skill, the last coin deals +20% damage instead
- When Clashing with a Clashable Guard Skill, Clash Power +1
1031301.name: Explosive Battering Ram

1031302.desc:
When activating [HeishouCombo], The Lord of Hongyuan Hong Lu gains the following effect as the [HeishouComboCountHonglu] effect:
- Inflict 1 [Sinking] upon inflicting [Burst] Potency or Count by using a Skill (3 times per turn)

On the turn this unit Substituted or Returned to the field, gain 3 [GrownHorns]
1031302.name: Lament of the Lost Sheep [亡羊之嘆]

1031311.desc:
Deal (-Target's SP / 3)% more damage against targets at less than 0 SP (max 15%, rounded down)

Deal +1% damage for every 2 ([Burst] + [Sinking]) on target (max 15%)
- Double this effect and max value against targets without SP

If this unit has [GrownHorns], the last coin of this unit's Base Skills deals +15% damage
- When attacking Skill Slot equipped with a Defense Skill, the last coin deals +30% damage instead
- When Clashing with a Clashable Guard Skill, Clash Power +3
1031311.name: Explosive Battering Ram

1031321.desc: Ally with the fastest Speed: On Hit with a Base Attack Skill against enemies with 2+ [Burst] Count or [Sinking] Count, inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (2 times per turn)
1031321.name: Flesh-Rending Horn Growth
